artist: Itō Shinsui; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; figure wearing a hat with a cow on a lead at L; back of cow, 2 huts and 3 chickens in LLC; steep drop-off at R to water in middle ground
inscription: 大嶌十二景之内　潮風 {Ōshima jūnikei no uchi, Shiokaze} (The Twelve Views of Ōshima Island, Sea Breeze)
markings: hand-applied red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | LLC, publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Sea Breeze
